fields.summary: Lock/unlock table should add database and table information to inputs and outputs of authz hook

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

fields.summary: Lock/unlock database should add current database to inputs and outputs of authz hook

comments.body:
[~dapengsun], the fix version shouldn't be set until the patch is committed so I've moved your fix versions into target versions.

* [JIRA Guidelines | https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/Hive/HowToContribute#HowToContribute-JIRAGuidelines]
[~leftylev], got it. Thank you for your information. :)

ATTACHMENT ID: 12772091 - PreCommit-HIVE-TRUNK-Build
+0.9 from me. The patch makes sense, [~alangates] can you double check?
Also, tests failed. Do files need the out file update?

The test failures definitely look relevant and need to be fixed or regenerated.  

The patch looks fine.  A comment on why you are selecting DDL_NO_LOCK in the lock function would be helpful, since it's confusing.  Also, analyzeLockTable and analyzeUnlockTable suffer from the same problem.  I don't know if you want to fix those as well.
I think the lock should still be {{DDL_NO_LOCK}}, I misunderstand LOCK and DDL_LOCK...

I agree that DDL_NO_LOCK is the right annotation, even on the lock side.  I think a comment on why it's right in the code would be helpful, since when I first looked at it it confused me.

As for whether you do the tables in this ticket or another is up to you, I think either is fine.
Updated the patch

Hi [~alangates], I have updated the comment of DDL_NO_LOCK, I also created HIVE-12495, it will also depend on the newly added method {{isExplicitLockOperation()}}, otherwise Driver will acquire shared lock for {{ReadEntity}}.
